channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump curbs immigration enforcement at farms, meatpacking plants, hotels and restaurants
item.description: Trump posted on his Truth Social site Thursday that he disapproved of how farmers and hotels were being affected.

item.title: Minnesota shooting suspect’s company claims he was ‘involved with security situations’ around the world
item.description: According to the website for his company Praetorian Guard Security Services, Boelter is listed as director of security patrols.

item.title: Military parade kicks off early amid rainfall as Trump looks on and brushes off ‘No Kings’ protests
item.description: The Republican president, on his 79th birthday, sat on a special viewing stand south of the White House.

item.title: Authorities still searching for suspect in shooting of 2 Minnesota state lawmakers
item.description: Drew Evans, superintendent of the Minnesota Bureau of Criminal Apprehension, said authorities were looking for 57-year-old Vance Boelter.

item.title: Protesters crowd into streets, parks and plazas at anti-Trump ‘No Kings’ demonstrations across US
item.description: Protests were planned in nearly 2,000 locations across the country, from city blocks and small towns to courthouses and community parks, organizers sa...

item.title: How Trump wants to use the tax code to crack down on undocumented immigrants
Gold is the new risk-free asset as Israel-Iran conflict rattles investors
Americans spend $10 billion more on Mother’s Day than Father’s Day. What’s up?
Middle East conflict is a ‘major wild card’ for Fed, former Powell adviser says
